website_summaries.verdict: MSI's GeForce RTX 2070 Armor graphics card has great cooling, plus overclocking headroom to spare. It's solid for 1440p play, but it performs much like the outgoing GTX 1080, so step up to an RTX 2080 if you want a generational performance gain.
cons: Priced higher than GTX 1070 it replaces
Not powerful enough for maxed-out 4K gaming in every game

customer_reviews.title: Missing Cables
customer_reviews.text: Does not come with cables and adapters as advertised. Now have to wait even longer and spend more money on the cables you claimed to of provided. Also Didn't receive Battlefield 5 Promotional code. Don't even know if card works yet because I can't power it on.
customer_reviews.author: lachlanfewster37

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Wow this card is good, if you're undecided and want an upgrade - do it! Card build is solid and has some serious cooling (fans/heatsinks). Didn't contain Battlefield V code but AMZ Cust Serv resolved promptly via chat. Doesn't contain power cables (I had these come with my PSU anyway) or DP/HDMI.
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: This card is amazingly powerful for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed at the power of this card. I have a Ryzen 2700X on a Z470 MB with 16GB RAM. This card allows this machine to run everything at really amazing frame rates with full detail in about every game. I can't believe people are marking this card down as it doesn't come with leads and adaptors. It's amazing value for what it is. GET ONE, YOU WILL BE HAPPY.
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: Great card and great value
customer_reviews.text: At only £490, I jumped at the oppurtunity to buy this card. The MSI Armor cards are always underclocked, that's why they're cheaper but overclocking the card is an easy way to counter that fact. In terms of preformance, it is better than the 1070ti and preforms similar to a GTX 1080. Many reviews have marked this card down because it doesn't come with cables, but if your buying an RTX card then you should already have at least two 6+2 pin connectors and if you don't, then your machine is likely not powerful enough and will bottleneck the hell out of this card so you're better off getting something less powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but good for 4k
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace my GTX970, was easy to install but MSI are a bit stingy with no accessories added to the box. Card can get a little noisy but not major. Plays new titles at 4K with some of the settings turned down. Quite happy with it so far but expensive compared to what the 970 was 3-4 years ago. Not MSI fault just Nvidia going for more profits!
customer_reviews.author: MarkBmth1977

customer_reviews.title: No adaptors or cables with purchase. Item not as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and use, seems to be stable and works fine, but I have now had to purchase another set of cables for my second monitor as I was expecting the card to arrive with at least one lead. It did not.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good GPU
customer_reviews.text: I love this GPU. It is very easy to install. The backplate look very dope and the RGB is cool with the MSI logo. I can play games such as Fortnite Battle Royale with high fps with no lag. Very good high quality, smooth, lag free gameplays. Only problem I have is it makes a noise when before the fans start to spin. I'm not sure why that happens or if its normal because I have never had a RTX GPU before. But other than that, I would definitly recommend this GPU!
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed T.

customer_reviews.title: Fast, big, quiet
customer_reviews.text: 1) This card is fast and enables stable 60fps at 1080p in Borderlands 3 in DX12 Ultra. This is one of the most demanding titles out there right now so older games will have no problem. 2) Do not underestimate the size of this card. It only fit into my NZXT h440 case by encroaching into the unoccupied drive bay. If your case is smaller then you may need to get a bigger one or choose a different card. 3) In 2D mode and general desktop use the cooling fans do not spin which keeps the noise levels down.
customer_reviews.author: James Moore

customer_reviews.title: Good fast card but beware the length - you need a big case.  This is a beast...
customer_reviews.text: Great card - watch the length though as it is long, bit of a squeeze getting into the case. Noisier than my old card but not excessively so. Nice and fast though and stopped some jumpy games from jumping any more!!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Horler

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Works fine and easy to install hardware and software and graphics look amazing and able to use very high graphic settings on any of the latest games.
customer_reviews.author: clr

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: I wen't with msi, because you can get msi afteburn to control the speed of the fans
customer_reviews.author: Jon R.

customer_reviews.title: Card doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: All installed correctly but the card crashes every game within 3 seconds of starting
customer_reviews.author: Mr David Wenlock

customer_reviews.title: Box contains cables and adapter
customer_reviews.text: Card really comes without cables or adaptors. Have to order now cable or adapter...
customer_reviews.author: Alexei Minacov

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Great. Performance amazing. Can be a little loud if u are playing very demanding games but I would expect if u do that u will have headphone in so amazing product
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Recieved wrong item??
customer_reviews.text: Recieved an old 1050ti in the box of a 2070???
customer_reviews.author: Medwa

customer_reviews.title: Quite. Over 60fps at 1440p. RTX features. Expensive.
customer_reviews.text: Great card for 1440p and even games at 4k. Runs quite, +150 on GPU overclock. Solid build and good quality. Only just fitted in my case. Good upgrade if you own a GTX 980, 980ti, 1060 or even a GTX 1070. If you have to have High/Ultra settings on all games at 4k you will need a RTX 2080ti and a spare £1k (ouch).
customer_reviews.author: mojoba

customer_reviews.title: I really liked it.
customer_reviews.text: Before i bought MSI GeForce RTX 2070 , i had a NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 1060 and it was loud and not that good but, This new graphics card is really quiet. I really liked and may buy more products from MSI. its graphics are really good.
customer_reviews.author: Yuri

customer_reviews.title: Best graphics card for the money
customer_reviews.text: For this price it’s the only graphics card to buy
customer_reviews.author: Scott

product_meta.title: MSI GeForce RTX 2070 ARMOR 8G, Black
product_meta.description: GeForce RTX graphics cards are powered by the Turing GPU architecture and the all-new RTX platform. This gives you up to 6X the performance of previous-generation graphics cards and brings the power of real-time ray tracing and AI to games. The revolutionary NVIDIA Turing architecture, combined with our all new GeForce RTX platform, fuses together real-time ray tracing, artificial intelligence, and programmable shading to give you a whole new way to experience games. Ray tracing is the definitive solution for lifelike lighting, reflections, and shadows, offering a level of realism far beyond what’s possible using traditional rendering techniques. Turing is the first GPU capable of real-time ray tracing. Artificial intelligence is driving the greatest technology advancement in history, and Turing is bringing it to computer graphics. Armed with Tensor Cores that deliver AI computing horsepower, Turing GPUs can run powerful AI algorithms in real time to create crisp, clear, lifelike images and special effects that were never before possible. A power supply of at least 750w is recommended for use with the graphics card.
feature_bullets: NVIDIA Turing architecture/ Next level artificial intelligence/ Real-time ray tracing/ Programmable shading
Unparalleled immersion/ Up to 6x faster performance
The latest, low power GDDR6 memory/ NVLink/ Virtual Link
Nvidia Ansel, Highlights, G-Sync Ready, Geforce Experience/ Microsoft DX 12 API/ GPU Boost/ VR Ready
